statements: DELETE FROM location_data WHERE tower_id = 1 AND equipment_type = 'Antenna';
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 30.123456 AND longitude > -75.789012;
DELETE FROM telecommunication_towers WHERE tower_name = 'Tower A';
DELETE FROM equipment_data WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND status = 'operational';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE tower_id = 1 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 500 AND tower_id = 1;
